About the UCI Campus Directory

ABOUT THIS DIRECTORY

The UCI Campus Directory provides an interactive search that allows you to connect with the people at UCI easier.

The directory is maintained by the Office of Information Technology (OIT). Please direct all inquiries to oit@uci.edu.

Along with OIT, the following members of the Donald Bren School of Information & Computer Sciences community contributed to the development of the site.

  • Dayue Bai (ICS Student)
  • Taewoo Kim (ICS PhD Student)
  • Chen Li (ICS Faculty)
  • Du Tran (ICS Computing Support)
  • Baihao Wang (ICS Student)

LISTINGS FOR THE PEOPLE AND DEPARTMENTS

The UCI Campus Directory contains listings for UCI faculty and staff, in addition to students who have chosen to be listed. Information for each person includes name, telephone number, address, and when available, e-mail address. The Directory also contains listings for departments on campus. Listings are updated nightly.

Privacy Notice

This directory has been compiled for the use and convenience of the faculty, staff, students, and affiliates of the University of California, Irvine and others dealing with UC Irvine. It is the property of the Regents of the University of California. In accordance with the California Information Practices Act, neither this directory nor the information contained herein may be used, rented, distributed, or sold for commercial purposes. Compilation or redistribution of information from this directory is strictly forbidden. Upon using this directory, you submit to these terms of use. For more details, please see the University guidelines for assuring the privacy of personal information in mailing lists and telephone directories.
